name: Teleport Between Asteroids
description:
Inspired by the arcade retro game Asteroids, in this game you should avoid the asteroids and destroy them to make points, but be carefull, you can't move, only teleport, but it will cost you part of yours points.

This game was made for ScoreSpace Jam #11 with the theme teleport.

How to play:

  • Right click to fire
  • Left click to teleport to that location
  • Esc to pause
